name: Gheldaron's blessing
desc:
<green>Reliar</> Orilise is granting this unit 30% more damage.
<red>Does not work if paired with Darghelon's blessing.</>

name: Orilise's scheming
desc:
<green>Reliar</> Orilise's provocations are penalizing this unit with 30% less damage.
<red>Does not work if paired with Lynine's corruption.</>

name: Manipulated
desc: Unit is unknowingly playing into <green>Reliar</> Orilise's schemes. Unit has an aura that reduces nearby allies' damage by 30%.

name: Orilise's scheming
desc: <green>Reliar</> Orilise's schemes are penalizing this unit with 30% less damage.

name: Provoke
desc: Orilise chooses an enemy to inflict <red>[PROVOKED]</>, which make their statuses diminished against Orilise.

name: <red>[PROVOKED]</>
desc: Unit's statuses are decreased against Orilise.

name: Irritate
desc: When defending against a <red>[PROVOKED]</> enemy, Orilise has a LUK% chance to make their attacks backfire.

name: <red>[DISCOURAGED]</>
desc: Unit cannot double.

name: Severed Sexuality
desc: Unpeople give off an aura that negatively affects Succubi nearby.

name: Sexual dampening
desc: This Succubus is repulsed by the presence of an Unperson nearby! Stats diminished.

name: Sexy Unsexiness
desc: This succubus is not affected by the Unpeople aura.

name: Slippery
desc: Dari can pass through enemies.

name: Triumphant
desc: Dari can move again after defeating an enemy unit.

name: Scout
desc: <green>[Orcent Synergy]</> Dari scouts enemies adjacent to her, decreasing their avoid and marking them as possible sniping targets for Orcent.

name: <red>[SCOUTED]</>
desc: Unit has -5 avoid. Can be targeted by Orcent's Snipe Target.

name: Intervention
desc: <green>[Orcent synergy]</> Balia can intervene with Orcent's emotions, resetting his <red>Brutality</> and <blue>Serenity</> stacks to 0.

name: Illusioned
desc: Unit's presence is being veiled by Yarra's illusions. Lose this status after combat.

name: <red>[CHARMED]</>
desc: Unit is charmed by Yarra's exquisite presence and will follow her without attacking. Status is lost when getting hit.

name: Flaming Thrust
desc: <green>[Robin]</>

name: Agile Guard
desc: <green>[Hilstara synergy]</> Ginasta raises her shield quickly, greatly reducing the damage from an enemy's counter.

name: Darghelon's blessing
desc:
Elder Lynine is granting this unit 30% more protection against enemy attacks.
<red>Does not work if paired with Gheldaron's blessing.</>

name: Lynine's corruption
desc:
Elder Lynine is using lust magic to make this unit 30% more vulnerable against attacks.
<red>Does not work if paired with Orilise's scheming.</>

name: Lynine's favor
desc: This succubus is being inspired by Elder Lynine. While this is active, bonus growths when leveling up.

name: Overgasm
desc: Lynine's skills increase the Overgasm meter. When this reaches 10, Lynine is overstimulated and will suffer <red>[PARALYSIS]</>.

name: Worthless
desc: This puppet is but a shell of its former self. Its stats are diminished. This effect is stronger for each puppet currently on field.
components: Global Trin copy kills Trin gains exp

name: Burden
desc: Trin has one stack of this for each puppet currently on field. Decreases MOV by 1 and costs <blue>1 mana</> per turn.

name: Active Synergy
desc: Unit is activating the synergy ability of an ally nearby.

name: Soul Reaping
desc: If this unit kills an enemy, Wynn will collect their soul.

name: Soul Reaping
desc: If this unit kills an enemy, Wynn will collect their soul.

name: Collect Souls
desc: Wynn is on the lookout for nearby corpses. For each enemy defeated (by Wynn or any ally) within 3 tiles, gain one stack of <blue>Bone pile</>.

name: Bone pile
desc: Each stack of Bone pile enables an use of Wynn's Necromancy Spells.

name: Succubus Mana
desc: Playable succubi start each chapter with <blue>0 mana</>. They regain mana passively, on hit and on kill. They can <green>masturbate</> to regain <blue>4 mana</>.

name: Wary Fighter
desc: Can't double attack or be double attacked.

name: Unaffected
desc: Unit reflects negative statuses back at the enemy.

name: Fucking Invincible
desc: The Incubus King has powers beyond understanding, granting him exceptional strength and defense.

name: Dreadful Predator
desc: The Incubus King's overwhelming presence intimidates those nearby, halving the MOV of enemy units within 5 tiles.

name: <red>[FEARFUL]</>
desc: Movement is halved.

name: Useless negative to enable Restore
desc: because otherwise Restore won't work

name: <red>[SILENCE]</>
desc: Unit cannot use magic.

name: <red>[POISON]</>
desc: Unit randomly receives up to 5 damage per turn.

name: <red>[BLIND]</>
desc: Unit's accuracy and avoid greatly decreases.

name: <red>[CONFUSION]</>
desc: Unit behaves on their own and can't tell friend or foe.

name: <red>[SLEEP]</>
desc: Unit is asleep. -5 DEF and RES. Unit awakes when receives a hit.

name: <red>[STUN]</>
desc: Unit cannot act for the remainder of their turn.

name: <red>[PARALYSIS]</>
desc: Unit cannot move.

name: <red>[EXPOSED]</>
desc: Unit is more likely to receive critical hits. Can be stacked.

name: <red>[LUST DRAIN]</>
desc: Unit loses 5 mana at the beginning of the turn.

name: <red>[LUST DEATH]</>
desc: Unit is incapacitated until the end of chapter.

name: <red>[MANA SIP]</>
desc: Unit is having his mana drained by Riala's magic. Loses <blue>1 mana</> at the beginning of the turn.

name: Speed Penalty
desc: -5 SPD.

name: Strength Penalty
desc: -5 STR.

name: Defense Penalty
desc: -5 DEF.

name: Indecisive
desc: Unit can either move or attack, but not both on the same turn.

desc: Unit cannot receive <red>[SILENCE]</>.

name: Poison Immunity
desc: Unit cannot receive <red>[POISON]</>.

desc: Unit cannot receive <red>[BLIND]</>.

desc: Unit cannot receive <red>[CONFUSION]</>.

desc: Unit cannot receive <red>[STUN]</>.

desc: Unit cannot receive <red>[PARALYSIS]</>.

desc: Unit cannot receive <red>[EXPOSED]</>.

name: Lust Drain Immunity
desc: Unit cannot receive <red>[LUST DRAIN]</>.

name: Lust Death Immunity
desc: Unit cannot receive <red>[LUST DEATH]</>.

desc: Attacks have a chance to inflict <red>[SILENCE]</>: Unit cannot use magic.

desc: Attacks have a chance to inflict <red>[SILENCE]</>.

desc: Attacks have a chance to inflict <red>[POISON]</>: Unit randomly receives up to 5 damage per turn.

desc: Unit randomly receives up to 5 damage per turn.

desc: Attacks have a chance to inflict <red>[SLEEP]</>: Unit is asleep. -5 DEF and RES. Unit awakes when receives a hit.

desc: Attacks have a chance to inflict <red>[SLEEP]</>.

desc: Attacks have a chance to inflict <red>[STUN]</>: Unit cannot act for the remainder of their turn.

desc: Attacks have a chance to inflict <red>[PARALYSIS]</>: Unit cannot act.

name: Heroic Blow
desc:
The Chosen can use a powerful attack. Effective against monsters.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Heroic Assault
desc:
The Chosen can unleash an all-powerful attack around it, damaging nearby enemies.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Heroic Aura
desc:
When at less than full health, the Chosen can call upon Ivala to heal their wounds.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Ivala's Blessing
desc: The Chosen is blessed with double the experience. His personal growth, however, is seriously lacking.

name: Aura Blighting
desc:
The Chosen heavily benefits from adjacent female units, gaining bonus combat stats and a chance to gain <green>[CONCEITED]</> at the start of the turn. The women, however, are debuffed with <red>[REPULSED]</>.
<green>[CONCEITED]</>: Bonus CRIT. Lasts for one combat.
<red>[REPULSED]</>: -2 to all stats as long as he is nearby.

name: Aura Blighting
components: any(['Female' in u.tags for u in target_system.get_adj_units(game.get_unit('Chosen'))])

name: Conceited
desc:
"I have to show them how awesome I am!"
Bonus CRIT. Lasts for one combat.

name: Repulsed
desc:
If only he was as torelable as he is powerful.
-2 to all stats.

name: Safe Approach
desc: <green>[Simon Synergy]</> The Chosen has begrudgingly decided to hear Simon's advice for once. Unit has bonus damage when defending.

name: Safe Approach
desc: <green>[Simon Synergy]</> The Chosen has begrudgingly decided to hear Simon's advice for once. Unit has bonus damage when defending.

name: Strategic Strikes
desc: Simon can use a plethora of special strikes that cause negative effects on his enemy.

name: Blinding Strike
desc:
Simon can use Blinding Strike. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.
<red>[BLINDED]</>: Unit loses HIT and AVOID. Duration: 2 turns.

name: Silencing Strike
desc:
Simon can use Silencing Strike. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.
<red>SILENCE</>: Unit cannot use magic items. Duration: 3 turns.

name: Stunning Strike
desc:
Simon can use Stunning Strike. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.
<red>STUN</>: Unit cannot act. Duration: 1 turn.

name: Rebuke
desc:
Cures negative status effects from a nearby ally.
Costs <blue>5 mana</>.

name: Shelter
desc: Unit can rescue an adjacent ally. When paired-up, gain bonus DEF and RES.

name: Shelter
desc: Unit can rescue an adjacent ally. When paired-up, gain bonus DEF and RES.

name: Heroic Imitation
desc:
<green>[Chosen Synergy]</> Simon can attempt to copy the Chosen's power.
Effective against monsters. Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Heroic Imitation
desc:
<green>[Chosen Synergy]</> Simon can attempt to copy the Chosen's power.
Effective against monsters. Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Aptitude
desc: Unit has higher growths.

name: Revenge Driven
desc: While at less than half of MAX HP, Mira can double attack on defense.

name: Premature Advance
desc: Mira has her eyes set on a dangerous future. Mira has extra movement on the first 3 turns.

name: Overbearing Jokes
desc: <green>[Duro Synergy]</> Mira can't stand Duro's jokes! Mira can move after attacking.

name: Overbearing Jokes
desc: <green>[Duro Synergy]</> Mira can't stand Duro's jokes! Mira can move after attacking.

name: Laser Focus
desc: If there are no adjacent allies, and Mira is not paired-up, she gains bonus accuracy.

name: Like a champ
desc: Doubles Duro's defense. Has DEF% chance of activating when defending a strike.

name: Like a champ
desc: Doubles Duro's defense. Has DEF% chance of activating when defending a strike.

name: Bear hug
desc: Duro locks adjacent enemies into a hot, sweaty bear hug. Neither Duro nor adjacent enemies can dodge attacks.

name: Bear hug
desc: Unit is receiving a hot bear hug from behind. AVOID is negated.

name: Grand Entrance
desc: When Duro is at full HP, his attacks hit enemies in an area.

name: Projectile Parry
desc: Duro used to be good at tennis, you know? Duro can counter attacks even if they're far away.

name: Remembrance
desc: <green>[Lucia Synergy]</>. Lucia reminds Duro of his wife's fierceness. Duro recovers 30% max HP at the start of the turn.

name: Remembrance
desc: <green>[Lucia Synergy]</>. Lucia reminds Duro of his wife's fierceness. Duro recovers 30% max HP at the start of the turn.

name: Puppy Eyes
desc: While at full HP, Monica is more likely to avoid enemy attacks.

name: Rally Resistance
desc: Monica has faith that everything is going to be okay, and those around her feel the same. She can use <green>Rally Resistance</>, increasing RES of allies within 2 tiles for the remainder of this turn. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.

name: Rally Resistance
desc: Resistance increased by Monica.

name: Awkward Silence
desc: Monica has MAG% at the beginning of the turn to gain the Awkward Silence aura. Enemies affected by this aura gain [SILENCED].

name: Awkward Silence (ACTIVE)
desc: Enemies nearby cannot use magic while this aura is active.

name: Soothing Presence
desc:
Monica's presence might not be heard, but is definitely felt. Monica can heal an ally from far away.
Costs <blue>5 mana</>.

name: Penitence
desc:
When at more than half health, Monica can use Penitence: Heals in an area. Allies gain <red>[BLESSED]</>. Costs <red>HP equal to half of MAX HP</> and <blue>10 mana</>.
<red>[BLESSED]</>: Unit takes half damage in the next combat.

name: Blessed
desc: Unit feels the touch of someone inside them... in a wholesome way. Takes half damage. Lasts for one combat.
components: Lost after combat with an ally
Lost after combat with an enemy
Lost after combat if using an AOE item

name: Inspiring Ambition
desc: <green>[Mira Synergy]</> Inspired by Mira's ambition, Monica has greater MAG and increased chance to gain MAG when leveling up.

name: Inspiring Ambition
desc: <green>[Mira Synergy]</> Inspired by Mira's ambition, Monica has greater MAG and increased chance to gain MAG when leveling up.

name: Flashy Strike beta
desc: Antarion can use his special attack <green>Flashy Strike</>. It most certainly defeats any enemy with one strike.

name: Drink Potion
desc: While at less than full life, Antarion can drink one of his many potions. One use per chapter.

name: Attention Is All You Need
desc: <green>[Milena Synergy]</>. Nothing makes Antarion happier than the gaze of a beautiful lady. Antarion heals adjacent allies 50% of damage dealt.

name: Attention Is All You Need
desc: <green>[Milena Synergy]</>. Nothing makes Antarion happier than the gaze of a beautiful lady. Antarion heals adjacent allies 50% of damage dealt.

name: Flashy Strike
desc: Each combat initiated by Antarion builds 1 charge. Defeating a foe builds 2 charges. At 4 charges, Antarion can use this skill for a guaranteed critical attack.

name: Critical Boost
desc: Antarion gaints +10 CRIT. After a critical attack, he gains <red>[OVERCONFIDENCE]</>: +15 HIT, -15 AVOID. Lasts until end of next combat.

name: Overconfidence
desc: Antarion is too focused on his own success. HIT+15, AVOID-15. Lasts until end of next combat.

name: Clutch King
desc: Antarion gains more crit damage the less health he has.

name: Survival First
desc: While at less than half of max HP, Antarion has bonus AVOID and MOV.

name: Twice the Threat
desc:
If Lucia is in Guard Stance with Cassian,
Cassian will always attack first.

name: Twice the Threat
desc: Heals half of damage dealt.

name: No Privacy
desc: On <red>odd</> turns, Cassian can move next to Lucia, regardless of MOV or where she is on the map.

name: Burning Advance
desc: <green>[Rosa Synergy]</>. Rosa kindly sets Cassian's weapons ablaze. Cassian has a chance to inflict <red>[BURNED]</> on his attacks.

name: Burning Advance
desc: <green>[Rosa Synergy]</>. Rosa kindly sets Cassian's weapons ablaze. Cassian has LUK% chance to inflict <red>[BURNED]</> on his attacks.

name: Defiant Strike
desc: For the first 3 combats this chapter, Cassian has incrased defense when attacking.

name: Exposing Crash
desc:
Cassian has a chance to inflict <red>[EXPOSED]</> when attacking an enemy.
<red>[EXPOSED]</>: Unit is more likely to receive critical attacks. Can be stacked.

name: Exposing Crash
desc:
Cassian has a chance to inflict <red>[EXPOSED]</> when hitting an enemy.
<red>[EXPOSED]</>: Unit is more likely to receive critical attacks. Can be stacked.

name: Twice the Threat
desc:
If Cassian is in Guard Stance with Lucia,
Lucia heals half of damage dealt.

name: Twice the Threat
desc: Always attacks first.

name: No Privacy
desc: On <red>even</> turns, Lucia can move next to Cassian, regardless of MOV or where he is on the map.

name: Striking Defiance
desc: For the first 3 combats this chapter, Lucia has incrased damage when defending.

name: Exposing Guard
desc:
Lucia has a chance to inflict <red>[EXPOSED]</> when defending a hit by an enemy.
<red>[EXPOSED]</>: Unit is more likely to receive critical attacks. Can be stacked.

name: Exposing Guard
desc:
Lucia has a chance to inflict <red>[EXPOSED]</> when hit by an enemy.
<red>[EXPOSED]</>: Unit is more likely to receive critical attacks. Can be stacked.

name: Make Way
desc: <green>[Safado Synergy]</>. Safado accidentaly teaches Lucia how to push people away. Lucia can use Make Way, which damages and pushes opponents. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.

name: Make Way
desc: <green>[Safado Synergy]</>. Safado accidentaly teaches Lucia how to push people away. Lucia can use Make Way, which damages and pushes opponents. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.

name: Webbed
desc: Unit has -5 SPD and -3 MOV for the remainder of their turn.

name: Flashy Escape
desc:
<green>[Antarion Synergy]</>. While painful to admit, Safado learns from Antarion's swordskills. Swaps user with the target, also applying <red>[BLINDED]</>. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.
<red>[BLINDED]</>:Unit's accuracy and avoid greatly decreases.
HIT -50. AVOID - 50.

name: Flashy Escape
desc:
<green>[Antarion Synergy]</>. While painful to admit, Safado learns from Antarion's swordskills. Swaps user with the target, also applying <red>[BLINDED]</>.
<red>[BLINDED]</>:Unit's accuracy and avoid greatly decreases.
HIT -50. AVOID - 50.

name: Stalling Stance
desc:
Safado can grant himself the Stalling Stance status. When active, neither Safado nor their enemies will land their attacks. Enemis are more likely to attack him. Safado inflicts <red>[FRUSTRATED]</> on enemies after combat. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.
<red>[FRUSTRATED]</>: DEF and RES reduced. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Debuff is lost on receiving an attack.

name: Stalling Stance
desc: Safado will dodge enemy attacks, but also miss his own. Enemies are more likely to attack Safado.

name: <red>[FRUSTRATED]</>
desc: DEF and RES reduced. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Debuff is lost on receiving an attack.

name: Nothing Personal
desc:
Safado can pivot to the other side of the enemy, inflicting <red>[POISONED]</>. After that, his next attack on this turn also inflicts <red>[POISONED]</>. Costs <blue>10 mana</>.
<red>[POISONED]</>: Unit randomly receives up to 5 damage per turn.

name: Nothing Personal buff
desc:
Safado's next attack will inflict <red>[POISONED]</>.
<red>[POISONED]</>: Unit randomly receives up to 5 damage per turn.
components: Lost after combat with an ally
Lost after combat with an enemy
Lost after combat if using an AOE item

name: Chameleon Stance
desc:
Safado can gain <green>[CHAMELEON STANCE]</>. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.
<green>[CHAMELEON STANCE]</>: Safado can pass through enemy units. He has bonus MOV and AVOID. Less likely to be attacked by enemy units. This buff is lost when Safado attacks someone.

name: Sneaking Stance
desc:
Safado can pass through enemy units and has bonus MOV.
Buff is lost when Safado attacks someone.

name: <green>[CHAMELEON STANCE]</>
desc:
Safado can pass through enemy units. He has bonus MOV and AVOID. Less likely to be attacked by enemy units.
This buff is lost when Safado attacks someone.

name: Social Distancing
desc: Safado can shove any unit 1 tile away. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.

name: Firewall
desc:
Rosa ignites fire at an empty tile. Units standing on it get <red>[BURNED]</>. Lasts 3 turns. Cooldown: 3 turns. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.
<red>[BURNED]</>: 5 damage at the start and end of unit's turn.

name: Firewall
desc:
Rosa ignites fire at an empty tile. Units standing on it get <red>[BURNED]</>. Lasts 3 turns. Costs <blue>6 mana</>.
<red>[BURNED]</>: 5 damage at the start and end of unit's turn.

name: Cozy Warmth
desc: While Rosa is standing on a <red>Firewall</> and equipping <red>Fire</> magic, +2 to all stats and CRIT greatly increased.

name: <red>[BURNED]</>
desc: Unit receives 5 damage at the start and end of the turn.

name: <red>[BURNED]</>
desc: Unit receives 5 damage at the start and end of the turn, as long as they are on <red>Firewall</>.

name: Burned (Firewall)
desc: Unit is receives 5 damage at the start and end of the turn, as long as they are on <red>Firewall</>.

name: Burned (Firewall)
desc: Unit is receives 5 damage at the start and end of the turn, as long as they are on <red>Firewall</>.

name: Hot Business
desc:
When using a <red>Fire</> spell, Rosa has MAG% chance to inflict <red>[BURNED]</> on her enemy.
<red>[BURNED]</>: 5 damage at the start and end of unit's turn.

name: Fast Fire
desc: <green>[Cassjan Synergy]</>. Rosa learned with Cassian that, sometimes, it's better to act quick and think later. Rosa has increased attack speed.

name: Fast Fire
desc: <green>[Cassjan Synergy]</>. Rosa learned with Cassian that, sometimes, it's better to act quick and think later. Rosa has increased attack speed.

name: Fan the Flames
desc: Some people just want to watch the world burn. Rosa has bonus damage and damage reduction against <red>[BURNED]</> enemies.

name: Tarrying Pyre
desc: When Rosa dies (Classic mode) she restores her life and goes berserk.

name: Tarrying Pyre
desc: This is Rosa's last moment.

name: Post Nut Prayer
desc:
<green>[Monica Synergy]</>. Milena learned from Monica the relaxing effect of spiritual pursuit. When dancing, also grants the ally <green>[PNP]</>.
<green>[PNP]</>: Unit has bonus attack and defense speed.

name: Post Nut Prayer
desc:
<green>[Monica Synergy]</>. Milena learned from Monica the relaxing effect of spiritual pursuit. When dancing, also grants the ally <green>[PNP]</>.
<green>[PNP]</>: Unit has bonus attack and defense speed.

name: <green>[PNP]</>
desc: Unit has bonus attack and defense speed.

name: Mesmerizing Tune
desc:
Every now and then, Milena hits the perfect notes. For every 3 dances, Milena gives her allied target the <green>[ENTHRALLED]</> buff.
<green>[ENTHRALLED]</>: Unit has double crit chance on their second strike.

name: <green>[ENTHRALLED]</>
desc: Unit has double crit chance on their second strike.

name: Subtle Slithering
desc: Milena gradually gains more MOV and AVOID up until turn 5.

name: Subtle Slithering
desc: Hidden. Increases MOV.

name: Constricting Love
desc:
Milena entangles an enemy, inflicting it with <red>[SQUEEZED]</>. Costs <blue>15 mana</>.
<red>[SQUEEZED]</>: Unit cannot move, has decreased attack speed and defense speed.

name: <red>[SQUEEZED]</>
desc: Unit cannot move, has decreased attack speed and defense speed.

name: Euphoric Audience
desc: Milena's songs and dances make everyone vibrant. Milena increases SPD of <red>any unit</> at 2 tiles range.

name: Euphoric Audience
desc: Unit has +2 SPD.

name: Rock Throw
desc: ORC THROW BIG ROCK!

name: Last Stand
desc: When at less than half of max HP, unit will not be affected by any negative status.

name: Sword Breaker
desc:
Unit is buffed if enemy is using a <red>Sword</>.
DMG+10, HIT+30, DMG received -5.

name: True Form
desc: Minerve disperses the magic on her illusion, focusing instead on dealing damage through her true visage. She alternates between a single target powerful attack and a AoE attack.

name: Creepy Move
desc: Unit can teleport next to any enemy target.

name: Backup Plan
desc: When unit is under 25% HP, attacks first.

name: Protection Matters
desc: After defending two combats, ignores all damage from the third.

name: <red>[DESIRED]</>
desc: Not all attention is good. Unit can receive Riala's attack next turn.

name: <red>[LEAKING]</>
desc: Unit is leaking their tasty essence, much to the neaby Succubi's liking. Unit heals nearby enemies.

name: Growing Corruption
desc: The seed is growing. Once it reaches 5 charges, a regrettable creature will be born.

name: Unstable Aura 1
desc:
The seed emits a painful aura. Inflicts <red>any unit</> with <red>[CORRUPTED]</>. The aura increases its range at every turn.
<red>[CORRUPTED]</>: Unit's stats are halved.

desc:
The seed emits a painful aura. Inflicts <red>any unit</> with <red>[CORRUPTED]</>. The aura increases its range at every turn.

name: Defense +5
desc: Grants DEF +5.

name: Speed +5
desc: Grants SPD +5.

name: Skill +5
desc: Grants SKL +5.

name: Luck +5
desc: Grants LCK +5.

name: Dragonstone
desc: Grants STR +12, SKL +12, DEF +15, RES+20.

name: Resist+
desc: Grants additional RES.

name: Stoneskin
desc: Take half damage but inflicts -2 SPD.

name: Petrify
desc: Unit is petrified. Cannot avoid enemy attacks and suffers -30 dodge.

name: Rescue
desc: Unit is weighed down with a traveler.

name: Steal
desc: Can steal items from enemies with lower speed.

name: Locktouch
desc: Unit can open locks without a key.

name: Crit +30
desc: Grants +30 Critical change

name: Crit +15
desc: Grants +15 Critical chance

name: Anticrit
desc: Grants immunity to critical hits.

name: Wretched Air
desc: Grants STR +10, SKL +10, DEF +10, RES +10.

name: Ravager
desc: Grants STR +15, SKL +15, DEF +15, RES +15.

name: Demon Light
desc: Grants MAG +10, SKL +10, LCK +10, DEF +10, RES +15.

name: Berserk
desc: Unit is confused and can no longer tell friend from foe.

name: Torch
desc: Grants increased sight range in fog of war.

name: Void Curse
desc: No exp gained for attacking this unit.

name: Inspiration
desc: Aura - Grants +1 damage and +1 resist to allies.

name: Inspired
desc: Grants +1 damage and +1 resist.

name: Devil Luck
desc:
Skill gained by equipping the Devil Axe.
Receives damage equal to damage dealt.

name: Eclipse Helper
desc:
In order for enemies to use Eclipse, they must think they're inflicting a negative status or dealing damage.
Eclipse doesn't deal damage normally, so instead it secretly inflicts this status.

name: Dance
desc: The unit can <green>refresh</> an ally, letting them act again this turn. Costs <blue>4 mana</>.

name: Wagon mode
desc:
Bonus to movement in detriment to other stats.
Megail and adjacent units gain access to the <green>Convoy</>.

name: Command
components: any(u.position is None for u in game.get_units_in_party())

name: Aura of Might
desc:
<red>STR+5, DEF+5.</>
<blue>MAG-5, RES-5.</>

name: Aura of Spirit
desc:
<blue>MAG+5, RES+5.</>
<red>STR-5, DEF-5.</>

name: Shield of Purity
desc: Carina can increase nearby allies' DEF and RES for 2 turns. Costs <blue>6 mana</>.

name: Shield of Purity
desc: Unit has increased DEF and RES.

name: Revive
desc: Unit will revive and lose this status once it is defeated.

name: Offensive Rain
desc:
Vhala can use <red>Offensive Rain</>, which debuffs the opponent's defensive stats.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Defensive Rain
desc:
Vhala can use <red>Defensive Rain</>, which debuffs the opponent's offensive stats.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Blinding Rain
desc:
Vhala can use <red>Blinding Rain</>, which can inflict <red>[Blinded]</> onto the targets.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Defense Debuff
desc:
From Vhala's <red>Offensive Rain</>.
DEF -3. RES - 3.

name: Attack Debuff
desc:
From Vhala's <red>Defensive Rain</>.
STR -3. MAG - 3.

name: Defender's Frenzy
components: any([u.nid == 'Varia' for u in target_system.get_adj_units(game.get_unit('Hilstara'))]) and not 'Defenders_Frenzy_effect' in [skill.nid for skill in unit.skills] and not 'Servants_Frenzy_effect' in [skill.nid for skill in unit.skills]

name: Defender's Frenzy
components: not 'Servants_Frenzy_effect' in [skill.nid for skill in unit.skills]

name: Servant's Frenzy
components: not 'Defenders_Frenzy_effect' in [skill.nid for skill in unit.skills] and not 'Servants_Frenzy_effect' in [skill.nid for skill in unit.skills]

name: Disrupt
desc: Attempts to inflict various status effects on an enemy. <blue>✩5</>

name: Ambient Mana
desc: Robin can use Ambient Mana, which restores some of her <blue>mana</>. Has a limit, use and starting cooldown of 3.

name: Protected
desc:
Unit is being protected by Hilstara. Unit receives 20% less damage. MOV -1 and SPD -5.
Effect is active as long as Hilstara is adjacent.

name: Protecting
desc: Hilstara is protecting a unit. Costs 1 mana per turn. MOV -1 and SPD -5.

name: Mighty Bash
desc: <green>[Uyae synergy]</> Paralyses and shoves an enemy 2 tiles away. Costs <blue>8 mana</>.

name: Careful Positioning
desc: Orcent can forfeit other actions to move a number of tiles beyond regular movement.

name: Brutal Nature
desc: When attacking in <red>player phase</>, gain 1 stack of <red>Brutality</>.

name: Introspective Nature
desc: After being attacked in <red>enemy phase</>, gain 1 stack of <blue>Serenity</>.

name: Brutality
desc: For each stack of <red>Brutality</>, Orcent deals 2 more damage, and is dealt 5 recoil damage after combat. At 4 stacks, Orcent gets <red>[CONFUSED]</>. <red>Only active in Player phase</>.
components: Global Orcent Brute remove calm stack and move again

name: Serenity
desc: For each stack of <blue>Serenity</>, Orcent has 10 more crit chance, deals 2 less damage and heals 5 HP after combat. At 4 stacks, Orcent gets <red>[SLEEP]</>. <red>Only active in Enemy phase</>.
components: Global Orcent Calm remove brute stack

name: Plenitude
desc: Orcent has balanced his complex nature. Has increased stats, bonus damage, crit and post combat healing for this turn.
